EmailTemplate.name: ES-2016-03-11-Pure Accelerate.EMAIL-Pure Accelerate
EmailTemplate.subject: Save $100 to Pure//Accelerate with VMTurbo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://info.purestorage.com/transformation-squared.html]]> <[[https://www.purestorage.com/refs/mega-nav---accelerate.html]]>
Where would you go if nothing held you back?
Join VMTurbo at Pure//Accelerate for inspired keynotes, expert breakout sessions, and game-changing product demos. Be inspired by the most compelling thinkers, sharing their insights about what's possible.
VMTurbo Ben Nye will deliver a breakout session on our integration work with Pure Storage - bringing Application-Aware QoS to Pure Storage environments. Be sure to stop by the VMTurbo Booth for great swag and a demo of VMTurbo v5.4.
What you'll experience:
- Keynotes led by industry veterans including VMware COO, Carl Eschenbach and San Francisco Giants CIO, Bill Schlough. - Three exciting tracks designed to expand your thinking: Accelerate Your Cloud, Accelerate Your Applications and Accelerate Your Flash Future. Check out our agenda <[[https://www.purestorage.com/events/pure_accelerate2016/pure_events_schedule.html]]> for more info.
- The biggest new product launch of the year in enterprise technology.
On behalf of VMTurbo, please use code VMturbo16-100 for $100 off registration today!
<[[https://www.purestorage.com/refs/mega-nav---accelerate.html]]>
When Monday March 14th Tuesday March 15th
Where Pier 48 San Francisco, CA
What A conference by innovators for innovators
